name: Hot Spinach & Artichoke Bites
description: Savoury bites perfect for any occasion. Better than store-bought, these can be prepared in advance and frozen. Simply freeze uncooked on a Sheet Pan; once frozen, place in freezer bags and bake when ready.

ingredients.name: Spinach & Artichoke Hot Dip or Herb & Garlic Dip
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or hot dip of your choice, prepared, chilled

preparation: Roll puff pastry into a thin 10.5” square. Cut into triangles
Spoon dip onto each triangle: 1⁄2 tsp for small, 1–2 tsp for large. Starting at the wide end, roll up each bite.
Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Brush with milk, if desired, and bake until golden brown, 14–16 minutes.
